about_the_game:
Void Mother: Survivor is a fast paced action shooter with roguelite elements. Conquer a relentless horde of horrific fever dream creatures. Theorycraft with player passives and navigate randomly generated items whilst battling your way to become an unstoppable force. Survive long enough to face the true evil, Void Mother herself.

TL;DR

  • A Fever dream Single-player experience.

  • Roguelike elements with randomly generated player passives.

  • Action packed fun with theorycrafting items and distinct enemy types.

  • Meta progress with different characters and enhancements.

THEORYCRAFT TO RELEASE YOUR TRUE POTENTIAL

Theorycraft randomly generated layer passives. With amassed skill and some luck on your side, you will become the unstoppable force, breaking down the seemingly immovable object.

MULTIPLE DISTINCTIVE ENEMY TYPES TO SINK YOUR FURY INTO

Each enemy is distinct and will challenge you in different ways. You are always equipped to deal with the slow and weak. But don't slack off or they will grow too strong.

A FAST PACED THRILLRIDE AND YOU’RE THE DRIVER!

Behind, in front, to your left or right. They are everywhere, a never ending feast. You need to stay alert and keep up without fail and do so by sending a message. Make them suffer, reap the reward, and show them what true pain feels like.

META PROGRESSION, COLLECT KEYCARDS

Build yourself up, purchase new characters, whatever tickles your fancy. There is progress to be made outside each run with different kinds of Masks and Enhancements. That will continuously alter the way you play and interact with the enemy.

content_descriptors.notes: Void Mother features violence and may not be suitable for all ages.

name: Void Mother: Survivor Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 5 4600G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K / AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 / AMD RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Conquer Void Mothers fever dream creatures in this action packed horde shooter. Theorycraft with player passives and navigate a fast paced world with randomly generated items whilst battling your way to become an unstoppable force.
